1174718359310671874.text: In the 18 years since the House authorized the use of military force to protect Americans from the terrorists responsible for 9/11, it’s been used to send our troops into over 30 countries and conflicts. That’s unsustainable. I know, I fought in some of them.

1104058284854706177.text:
We did it! I joined 233 of my colleagues today to pass sweeping reforms for the government in the For the People Act. --
   ✅ Protect your right to vote
   ✅ Get dark money out of politics
   ✅ Hold politicians accountable

1104052452914069507.text: Today’s the day! We’re voting on the biggest reforms since Watergate. Let’s kick big money out of politics and get our government working for the people again! #HR1 https://t.co/f1IMF8VcCy

1104049750058381312.text: Great to join @Tiffany_Muller (from @StopBigMoney) and @RepTjCox as we get ready to vote on #HR1 the biggest reforms in decades to get dark money out of politics. https://t.co/VbKhaMdSin

1104040194901270530.text: It’s not a question – let’s pass #HR1, end dark money, and make our democracy truly #ForThePeople! (6/6) https://t.co/ZTlv4KMrj2

1104039975904071681.text: On top of all that, #ForThePeople will ensure greater access to the ballot box, prohibit voter roll purges, and end partisan gerrymandering. (5/6)

1104039927640145920.text: And it does so much more: It will bolster ethics laws -- closing loopholes on lobbyists and stopping members of Congress from settling sexual harassment or discrimination cases with taxpayer money. (4/6)

1104039894538686464.text: #HR1 helps closes that loophole and provides more transparency and accountability in our elections. (3/6)

1104039681585545217.text: Right now, mega-donors are allowed to give MILLIONS of dollars to secret dark money groups designed to sway our elections and never have to disclose their identity. That needs to change. (2/6)

1104039653307502593.text: Since the beginning, I have vowed to get dark money out of politics to make sure our government is for the people, by the people, and of the people... (1/6)
